title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\IndexDatapoint\CrowdingTag
name: CrowdingTag
description:
Crowding tag is a constraint on a neighbor list produced by nearest neighbor search requiring that no more than some value k' of the k neighbors returned have the same value of crowding_attribute.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.IndexDatapoint.CrowdingTag

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.crowding_attribute
params.description: The attribute value used for crowding. The maximum number of neighbors to return per crowding attribute value (per_crowding_attribute_num_neighbors) is configured per-query. This field is ignored if per_crowding_attribute_num_neighbors is larger than the total number of neighbors to return for a given query.

methods.name: getCrowdingAttribute
methods.description:
